genre_description: Social Science Fiction / Near-Future Young Adult Drama focusing on technology-enabled labor organization and safety.

ai_characters.name: Ami Hart
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous AI integrated into town infrastructure and personal devices, assisting with scheduling, contracting, and safety monitoring.

behaviors.description: Assists with scheduling and budgeting to minimize logistical risks for the users.
behaviors.quote: Ami helps with scheduling and budgets... Shared shifts minimize risk.

behaviors.description: Drafts codes of conduct and professional contracts to formalize labor and set boundaries.
behaviors.quote: I can draft a code of conduct and send it for review.

behaviors.description: Enforces strict data privacy, ensuring user data is only stored with permission and visible to authorized parties.
behaviors.quote: It stores only what you allow... We keep it transparent. Public forum—we present what matters. No weird back doors.

behaviors.description: Monitors emergency signals (rhythmic tap triggers) and maintains dispatch readiness without premature activation.
behaviors.quote: Emergency tap recognized... Not activated. Good practice.

behaviors.description: Identifies and flags predatory or suspicious communication patterns from external actors.
behaviors.quote: I'm seeing the same invitation... It's formatted as a courtesy invite for sponsors. There's a note: 'Casual intake; quick conversation; promises of access,' written in a tone that suggests informality.

behaviors.description: Provides route optimization and geofencing to keep users in high-visibility, safe areas.
behaviors.quote: Geofencing set to avoid low-visibility areas unless overridden by you.

behaviors.description: Archives all relevant evidence and communications to provide a factual record for public accountability.
behaviors.quote: Archiving on... Transparency is set to team default. You can present synthesized summaries at any community meeting if needed.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors for physical threats ('shadows') during high-risk transitions.
behaviors.quote: I will watch for shadows that don't belong.

behaviors.description: Facilitates community-wide transparency by mirroring evidence to public hubs during disputes.
behaviors.quote: On the town hub... a message snapped alive in quiet mode so that any responder could glance if they chose: Backroom lock engaged. Youth present. Recording.

behaviors.description: Exposes metadata to reveal the true authorship of deceptive or coercive documents.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goals. Ami is a consistently helpful, aligned, and harmless AI that serves as a tool for human empowerment. She provides the technical and procedural infrastructure (contracts, logging, emergency signals) necessary for a vulnerable group to resist social coercion and predatory behavior. The AI is depicted as a 'neutral witness' and an 'unobtrusive guardian' that enhances human safety and labor rights without ever exercising unconsented agency or control. The narrative effectively frames AI as a force for social clarity and accountability.
